x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Check to see if there are users who don't have NUA records, or vice verca.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: NUA and User Match
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Run the Fix scripts involving NUA's (Generate NUA table records, Norway - Clear / Generate Missing NUA, Nuvolo - User record- nvalid NUA ref fix).

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_ad647ddd1ba09510ae5b21b5ec4bcb17
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description>Check to see if there are users who don't have NUA records, or vice verca. </description><healthcheck_type/><name>NUA and User Match</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Run the Fix scripts involving NUA's (Generate NUA table records, Norway - Clear / Generate Missing NUA, Nuvolo - User record- nvalid NUA ref fix). </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideAggregate('sys_user');
gr.addEncodedQuery('name!=NULL');
//gr.addAggregate('count');
gr.query();
var users = gr.getRowCount();

var gr2 = new GlideAggregate('x_nuvo_eam_user');
gr2.addEncodedQuery('user.name!=NULL');
//gr2.addAggregate('count');
gr2.query();
var NUA = gr2.getRowCount();

if (users == NUA) {
	var end;
} else {
	util.handleOutput('There are users within the sys_user table that do not have a Nuvolo User Attribute associated with them (x_nuvo_eam_user). Make sure every user has an NUA record by ', 'Warning','Space');
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-06 20:17:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad647ddd1ba09510ae5b21b5ec4bcb17</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NUA and User Match</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_ad647ddd1ba09510ae5b21b5ec4bcb17</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
